name: Dry & Grey demo
description:
An active period of game development is currently underway. The final version of the game will be available on itch.io (on the same page) and on Google Play. If you want to help the project develop further, you can donate any amount. Below you can see a detailed list of things that will be added to the game.

Goals
  • Adding background music
  • Three more new locations
  • New types of enemies (different for each location)
  • New bosses
  • New items
  • Lots of puzzles
  • New quests
  • Two endings
